name: sf-deployer
description: Zero-friction Salesforce deployments with visual file selection and automatic package.xml generation.

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules dist out && npm install && npm run webpack && npm run package
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf node_modules dist out *.vsix && npm ci --ignore-scripts && npm run webpack:prod && vsce package
scripts.refresh: npm run format && npm run build:prod
scripts.refresh:full: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build:prod
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run refresh
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run refresh
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run refresh
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run push:release
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run push:release
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run push:release
scripts.push:release: git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push && git push origin --tags
